name: TXTNG OF THE DEAD
description:
Inspired by Sega's Typing of The Dead, we bring you the world's first texting based, zombie survival game... for Nokias everywhere.

Text a word and hit 0 to shoot. Watch out as multiple ghouls will attack at once.  Kill 'em before they get too close.  

Best experienced on phones (obviously) but mouse and keyboard controls are also available:

Keyboard Controls 

  • 1 - Move Cursor forward
  • 2 - a, b, c
  • 3 - d,e,f
  • Q - g,h,i
  • W - j,k,l
  • E - m,n,o
  • A - p,q,r,s
  • S - t,u,v
  • D - w,x,y,z 
  • X - SHOOT (complete word)

This game is a submission for the nokia3310 gamejam 2.

Made By:

Shane Harper - Code & UI

James Older - Art & Design

David Shenoda - Art & SFX
